I am a second year PhD student in the School of Computing at KAIST. I work with Juho Kim as a member of KIXLAB.

My work falls in the intersection of human-computer interaction (HCI) and artificial intelligence (AI). I design tools that enable users to design, develop, and test novel applications powered by machine learning models. Recently, I have been interested in investigating how to embed human and personal values into ML models.
